title: Mary's Pizza Shack
typeOfFood: Lacto, American, Pizza, Fast food, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Chain pizzeria. This location offers a gluten-free crust which is vegan suitable. The pizza sauce and marinara sauce are without dairy, so you could order a pizza with vegetable toppings and omit cheese. Other vegan possibilities include linguine marinara and the rigatoni arrabbiata - specify no "spice mix" (contains parmesan cheese).
